entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Roman: budget weight loss
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫4,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫2,99

Application Description

Ready to kickstart your journey to a healthier you on a budget? Look no further than the Roman app ‚Äì your ultimate companion for achieving effective weight loss, shedding those extra pounds, and transforming your health without breaking the bank on expensive foods. Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Personalized Meal Plans: Access a diet calculator designed to meet your specific calorie and meal needs while keeping your budget in check. Input your current weight, and you'll receive a detailed meal plan tailored to your budget-friendly weight loss, calorie goals, and fat burning objectives. ‚Ä¢ Budget-Savvy Healthy Living: Embrace a healthier lifestyle with tips on nutrition, meal prep, and calorie-conscious choices that won't strain your wallet. Learn how to make every calorie count toward your health, budget weight loss goals, and fat burning efforts, all while enjoying affordable and nutritious food options. ‚Ä¢ Progress Tracking: Monitor your budget weight loss journey with built-in tracking features. Keep an eye on your calorie-conscious meal plans, nutrition intake, and your progress towards achieving your ideal weight, all while maximizing fat burning, on a budget. ‚Ä¢ Setting and Achieving Goals: Set realistic health and budget-friendly weight loss goals and use the app to track your progress. Stay motivated and accountable on your transformation journey, guided by expert nutritional advice and personalized tips for effective fat burning. ‚Ä¢ Budget-Friendly Meal Plans: Optimize your meal plans for cost-effective weight loss, ensuring you're on the right path to achieving your goals without overspending on food. Receive nutritional guidance that makes it easier to maintain a balanced diet while staying within your budget and supporting fat burning. ‚Ä¢ Calorie Tracking on a Budget: Keep a close eye on your daily calorie intake and expenditure while staying within your budgetary constraints. Achieve your weight loss and budget health goals without breaking the bank, thanks to our expert nutritional advice, progress monitoring tools, and fat burning insights. ‚Ä¢ Wellness and Transformation: Prioritize your wellness journey with our affordable and personalized approach to nutrition and health. Experience a transformation in your overall well-being while staying on budget, supported by effective fat burning strategies. The Roman app is your go-to solution for achieving a healthier, budget-conscious lifestyle. Say goodbye to costly diets and embrace a budget-friendly approach to weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning. Whether your goal is to lose weight, improve your health, or simply live more frugally while prioritizing your well-being, this app equips you with the tools, personalized guidance, and progress monitoring you need. Start your budget weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning transformation today with the Roman app!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Pool Slide Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Splish, splash, splosh! The time has come to create some waves and open your very own wet, wonderful (sometimes whacky) water park! Hear that? That‚Äôs the sound of super-slippy pool-slide shenanigans. You want in? Of course you do. Expand your water park, adding exciting facilities, and become the talk of the town. Your visitors will take selfies at your park, generating free publicity for you! Befriend them and they'll send you comments and suggestions. Make your visitors happy by offering a range of foods and beverages for purchase at food stalls, creating colored or scented pools, and giving away free floats and swimwear. Collect ingredients and cook foods, then create menus for your food stalls. You'll be spoiled for choice when customizing your water park, with a wide choice of attractions to build. You can also have both indoor and outdoor pools, so that no matter the weather, your visitors will always have somewhere to splash about in comfort. Can you create a wonderful water park that everyone will love? Download the game and get started right away! ---- „ÉªAll game progress is stored on your device. Save data cannot be restored after deleting or reinstalling the app. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp/. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on X(Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Mega Mall Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Design a towering mall of mega proportions! Attract droves of customers and elevate yourself to 5-star status in this mall management simulation game! Add anything from fast food joints to sushi restaurants, stairs and elevators--even a heliport--all with a touch of the finger! When your establishment's popularity reaches a certain point, a "Fever" is triggered in which customers swamp your mall! You can then exercise your newfound affluence by investing in the surrounding area--bringing in even more customers and being a good citizen at the same time! Oh yeah! Keep your eyes on the mega-prize--only you can build the ultimate mall! -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Tropical Resort Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Develop a lush island full of nature and aim to be the no. 1 resort! Build accommodation for your guests and get those tourists coming! Make the environment even nicer and discover great travel packages to give visitors the best vacation possible. Develop the resort to make your guests' dreams come true! On this ocean island, the sparkling sea is a huge attraction of itself. There's a huge variety of incredible fish waiting to be discovered! Try improving water quality by placing marine plants and rocks in the ocean, and releasing fish you've caught while fishing - you may attract new fishy residents! Once your resort starts drawing in more tourists, business partners will come asking to open stores and restaurants on your island, and you may even help them create new products! Make sure your resort meets their expectations and you'll both benefit! Got a juice stand on your island? Why not place a bench next to it? Some things work even better together, becoming feature spots. Discover such winning combinations and watch visitors pour in! Turn your tropical island into a vacation paradise! Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom. Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on X(Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dungeon Village 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫179,99 [‚Ç∫179,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

A new legend begins here! Build and manage a town in grasslands, snow fields, even in the underworld! Set up inns, weapon stores, and more to convince adventurers to come visit. Use items and equipment to power up your adventurers and help them get more gold and experience from their quests. Be on the lookout for new dungeons to explore and new monsters to fight! Need help attracting adventurers? Try building new facilities, selling new kinds of food, or improving the local area to earn Titles. Keep experimenting, and you might stumble on some rare awards... As your town develops and becomes more popular, adventurers won't just visit, but move in for good! The enemy roster from the previous game has been expanded with a host of quirky new monsters to fight. Play your cards right, and some monsters will become friendly and join you! Give them snacks, keep them happy, and they'll become valuable allies on your quests. Explore more and more of the world map to unlock new areas. Feel like a fresh start? Move your town to a different region to discover unseen monsters and bold new adventurers. Rise through the ranks and create the greatest town the kingdom has ever seen! Zoom in or adjust the screen size with touch controls. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Game Dev Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Manage your own game company and try to create a million-selling game in this unique simulation. Features the ability to develop your company's own game console, plus a system for changing your staff members' professions. Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills. As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of game genres and content to develop. Try to find the most popular combinations and develop for the latest platform! Your staff members can have a variety of game-related professions, from programmer to sound engineer. Work hard and you may reach the top of the video game industry! -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Hot Springs Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Build your own resort and propel it to success with but a touch of the finger in this one-of-a-kind simulation! Rooms, restaurants, arcades, and baths--position each facility to lull your guests into hot spring Nirvana and skyrocket your establishment to fame! Craft the perfect Japanese garden from lanterns, pine trees, azaleas, and more--you'll need it all if you want to attract VIPs like pop stars and novelists. There can only be one #1! Do you have what it takes? Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Day One
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PremiumÔºö‚Ç∫389,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫122,99 [‚Ç∫122,99 ~ ‚Ç∫389,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PremiumÔºö‚Ç∫122,99

Application Description

Apple‚Äôs App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world‚Äôs most trusted digital journal. ‚ÄúDay One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.‚Äù ‚Äì New York Times ‚ÄúDay One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.‚Äù ‚Äì Wired ‚ÄúThis superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.‚Äù ‚Äì Macworld WHY DAY ONE? Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE ‚Ä¢ Beautiful, award-winning design ‚Ä¢ Unlimited text entries ‚Ä¢ Unlimited photos and videos* ‚Ä¢¬†Powerful rich text formatting with markdown ‚Ä¢ Different journals for every aspect of your life* PRIVATE AND SECURE ‚Ä¢ Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe ‚Ä¢ End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private ‚Ä¢¬†Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID ‚Ä¢¬†Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT ‚Ä¢¬†Programmable reminder notifications ‚Ä¢ Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer‚Äôs cramp ‚Ä¢¬†Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries ‚Ä¢ Today view provides a summary of where you‚Äôve been and what you‚Äôve done JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac ‚Ä¢ The ability to email entries straight to your journal BUILT FOR REMINISCING ‚Ä¢ On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories ‚Ä¢ Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you‚Äôre looking for ‚Ä¢ Map view quickly shows all the places you‚Äôve journaled from *Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today. Privacy Policy: https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of Use: https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/ For technical assistance or other inquiries: https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫800,00 [‚Ç∫800,00 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

Application Description

It's similar to a Photo Sticker machine you see in local stores: Purikura, Icue. We have over 300+ cute sticker for you to create your cute pocket photo. News: This app supports iPad natively with full width and height. Features: - Add frames on your photo - Add stickers on the photo - Add your drawing on the photo - Undo function is provided - Add Text on the image - Position your stickers anywhere you like. - Easy and simple to use. Instruction: First open the photo, then zoom in and out so it position the photo correctly, then click Crop Image Icon. After that, the crop image icon is disabled. It will be active when you start to work on a new photo. Great Fun for my friends in: middle school high school college Student + dorm life University Working class people Keyword: Photo Picture Sticker, Purikura

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫33,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫33,99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

In-App Purchases

  • Small PackÔºö‚Ç∫10,00
  • Medium packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Big packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar ‚Äî your personal guide to the planet‚Äôs most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 ‚Äî World Wetlands Day March 3 ‚Äî World Wildlife Day March 21 ‚Äî International Day of Forests March 22 ‚Äî World Water Day March 23 ‚Äî World Meteorological Day April 7 ‚Äî World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 ‚Äî Earth Day May 22 ‚Äî International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 ‚Äî World Environment Day June 8 ‚Äî World Oceans Day June 17 ‚Äî World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 ‚Äî World Nature Conservation Day September 16 ‚Äî International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 ‚Äî World Animal Day October 13 ‚Äî International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 ‚Äî International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 ‚Äî International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

entry.title: Ghost Detector: Haunted Radar
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user. ‚Ä¢ This application might scare you. ‚Ä¢ All sensors are on one page. ‚Ä¢ A real radar to track anomalies. ‚Ä¢ Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector. ‚Ä¢ Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off. ‚Ä¢ More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them. Warning: If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately. Disclaimer: Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫4.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99 [‚Ç∫1.499,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫109,99
  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫459,99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Pre registration bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Game EditorÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Chairman's PaymentÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.799,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off
